cd "${TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY:=$TM_DIRECTORY}";
/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/bin/ruby <<'RUBY'
require "#{ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH']}/lib/exit_codes.rb" require "#{ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH']}/lib/ui.rb"
output = TextMate::UI.request_string( :title => 'Input', :prompt => 'Record Message', :button1 => 'Record' )
TextMate.exit_discard if output.nil?
output = `darcs record -a -m '#{output.strip.gsub(/(')/, '\\\\1')}'`
puts(output)
RUBY
